parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Excessive oil consumption can lead to premature engine wear, increased emissions, and potentially cause engine failure, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The "low engine oil" warning light illuminates on the dashboard
oil levels are consistently low between scheduled oil changes
oil levels drop by 1 quart or more between oil changes
oil dipstick shows low oil levels.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning of the infotainment system can cause distractions while driving, leading to potential accidents.
symptoms: Navigation system not working
backup camera not working
CMU (Center Meter Unit) glitching.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The excessive oil consumption can lead to engine damage, premature wear, and potential engine failure, which can cause accidents or strand the driver.
symptoms: Low oil warning
requiring frequent oil top-offs
oil consumption issue acknowledged by dealership.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Sudden battery failure can cause the vehicle to stall or lose power, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: Battery died
replaced by dealership without a clear cause.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission malfunction can cause loss of power, reduced acceleration, and increased risk of accidents, especially when driving in hilly or mountainous terrain.
symptoms: Transmission will not advance above 3rd gear
engine whining
manual shifting required
safety system deactivated message.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Erratic Adaptive Cruise Control and Automatic Braking
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty adaptive cruise control and automatic braking system can cause the vehicle to slow down or come to a sudden stop without a valid reason, increasing the risk of rear-end collisions or accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle slows down or brakes suddenly without any apparent reason
the system fails to recognize lane separation and turn lanes
the system mistakenly detects vehicles not in the same lane
the system triggers unnecessary braking
the system does not stay off when turned off.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty lane detection and tracking system can cause the adaptive cruise control and automatic braking system to malfunction, leading to erratic vehicle behavior and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The system fails to recognize lane separation
the system fails to detect turn lanes
the system mistakenly detects lanes where lines do not exist
the system has difficulty tracking lanes in certain conditions.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadequate Manufacturer Response and Dealership Service
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lack of response from the manufacturer and inadequate service from dealerships can leave customers feeling frustrated and ignored, potentially leading to continued use of faulty systems and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Dealership service claims everything is working correctly despite customer complaints
manufacturer fails to respond to customer complaints
manufacturer fails to address known issues.
